d: Checks when the song was last played, Total times it has been played, Last played by and the amount of woots/grabs/mehs

Displays a list of no-play genres
Estimates wait time to dj

Displays songs with the most grabs in the last 24 hours

Displays the first played info on current song
Displays the top songs in the last 24 hours

Used to settle a heated genre discussion
Displays total amount of triggers and the latest trigger created
